Landing.nosc-is-description: is a virtual digital innovation hub that provides digital innovation services for researchers, the business sector, and public authorities using cloud technologies and other advanced digital technologies.
Landing.nosc-purpose-title: The purpose of NOSC-UA DIH is to promote
Landing.nosc-purpose-description-1: cooperation between research infrastructures and innovative companies (including SMEs) based on digital technologies
Landing.nosc-purpose-description-2: the development of new products and services based on green and digital technologies, involving the innovation potential of scientific institutions of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine
Landing.nosc-purpose-description-3: the integration of Ukrainian SMEs and researchers into the European Research Area and the EU Digital Single Market.
Landing.feature-1: Joint development and piloting of digital innovation projects
Landing.feature-3: Access to an innovation ecosystem and networking
Landing.feature-4: Development of digital skills through education
Landing.industries-title: Areas of activity of the Digital Innovation Hub
Landing.industries-4: Digital technologies centre for non-destructive testing
Landing.partners-description: The infrastructure base for the Virtual Centre for Digital Science is the cloud cluster of the Ukrainian National Grid and the educational-research platform of the KAU Data Science Research Center. The implementation of the main project tasks focuses on the development of the UNG cloud grid infrastructure.

AboutUs.paragraph-1: Within the framework of the project of the Kyiv Academic University of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine and the Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine (KAU) "Development of the Virtual Centre of Digital Science" under the targeted comprehensive programme of scientific research of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine "Grid infrastructure and grid technologies for scientific and applied research", during 2018–2019 a web catalogue of cloud services of the Virtual Centre of Digital Science (VCDS) was created on the basis of the cloud cluster of the Ukrainian National Grid.
AboutUs.paragraph-2: The cloud cluster enables efficient use of computing resources by implementing the "on-demand resource allocation" model. Currently, the UA-BITP cloud site is the only cloud resource in Ukraine that meets all EGI requirements for availability and reliability and is included in the EGI Federated Cloud resources.
AboutUs.paragraph-3: In 2020, the Bogolyubov Institute for Theoretical Physics of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine (ITP), which was authorised by the Government of Ukraine (letter of the Ministry of Education and Science of Ukraine No. 1/11-6930 dated 09.10.2020) to represent Ukraine in the EOSC Association, submitted an application for membership in the EOSC Association. On 21 October 2020, an ITP representative took part in the EOSC Symposium, where draft versions of key EOSC documents, including the EOSC Association Statutes, were presented.
AboutUs.paragraph-4: On 17 December 2020, during the meeting of the General Assembly (EOSC General Assembly), the Bogolyubov Institute for Theoretical Physics of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine was recognised as a full member of the EOSC Association as the official representative of Ukraine. The EOSC Association unites 142 members, including 21 members with a national mandate (including Ukraine) and 49 members with observer status. The members of the EOSC Association include leading European research organisations, resource centres, and providers of grid and cloud services actively involved in the implementation of the European Open Science Cloud concept.

InnovationCenter.title: Digital Innovation Centre
InnovationCenter.description: The Virtual Digital Innovation Centre of the Kyiv Academic University (NOSC-UA DIH) provides digital innovation services for researchers, the business sector, and public authorities using cloud technologies and other advanced digital technologies:
InnovationCenter.generalModel: According to the general operating model of digital innovation hubs, NOSC-UA DIH develops an innovation ecosystem and provides its participants with basic services for the implementation of digital technologies:
InnovationCenter.technologies-1: integration, adaptation and configuration of various technologies
InnovationCenter.purpose: The purpose of NOSC-UA DIH is to promote:
InnovationCenter.purpose-1: cooperation between research infrastructures and innovative companies (including SMEs) based on digital technologies;
InnovationCenter.purpose-2: development of new products and services based on ‘green’ and digital technologies with the involvement of the innovative potential of scientific institutions of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine;
InnovationCenter.purpose-3: integration of Ukrainian SMEs and researchers into the European Research Area and the EU Digital Single Market.
InnovationCenter.description-1: NOSC-UA DIH was launched in 2021 as a non-profit project coordinated by the Kyiv Academic University (KAU) within the framework of the Targeted Programme of Scientific Research of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine (NASU) “Mathematical Modelling in Interdisciplinary Research of Processes and Systems Based on Intelligent Supercomputing, Grid and Cloud Technologies” for 2021–2025.
InnovationCenter.description-2: In January 2024, NOSC-UA DIH signed an agreement together with another Kyiv digital innovation hub “Centre 4.0 Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute” (Centre 4.0 KPI DIH) and 12 regional partners to establish the “Kyiv HighTech” DIH, coordinated by the Ukrainian Cluster Alliance. In July, within the Digital Europe Programme call, the “Kyiv HighTech” DIH received international status as a European Digital Innovation Hub (EDIH) from the European Commission.

InnovationCenterPartners.title: Digital Innovation Centre
InnovationCenterPartners.ecosystem-participant-1: The National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine (NASU) and its 12 research institutes representing the Academy.City Research Cooperation Association
InnovationCenterPartners.ecosystem-participant-2: Kyiv City State Administration – KAU’s partner in establishing the Academic.City Science Park
InnovationCenterPartners.dih-network-2: Digital Innovation Hub of Moldova (DIH, Moldova)
InnovationCenterPartners.dih-network-5: Hub-laboratory Internet of Things: DIH I4MS (Ukraine)
InnovationCenterPartners.enterprise-2: LLC “Scientific Park of Kyiv National Economic University (KNEU)”
